note.original: dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.7; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.12; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.3.78; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.70; udā. aṭṭha. 18; itivu. aṭṭha. 38; theragā. aṭṭha. 1.3; bu. vaṃ. aṭṭha. 2 nidāna kathā; mahāni. aṭṭha. 14; paṭi. sa. aṭṭha. 1.1.37; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.7; dī. ni. abhi. ṭī. 1.7; ma. ni. ṭī. 1.12; a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.170

note.snippet: Ettha ca samantabhadra, lokaji, chaḷabhiñña, advayavādī, sirīghana, akaniṭṭhaga

note.original: khaṇasama (ka.) khena ākāsena samā tulyā guṇā yassa so (tikaṇḍasesaṭīkā 1.1.8)

alternatives.alternative: khena ākāsena samā tulyā guṇā yassa so

note.original: khajiravimutti (ka.) khena ākāsajjhānena – suññabhāvanāyāti bhāvo – jayati saṃsārabhāvaṃ yo, ji+ kvipa suññavādīnaṃ boddhānaṃ ‘‘suññaṃ sabbameva’’ ityākārabhāvanāya saṃsārabhāvajayanato tathābhāvo (saddakappadduma)

alternatives.alternative: khena ākāsajjhānena – suññabhāvanāyāti bhāvo – jayati saṃsārabhāvaṃ yo, ji+ kvipa suññavādīnaṃ boddhānaṃ ‘‘suññaṃ sabbameva’’ ityākārabhāvanāya saṃsārabhāvajayanato tathābhāvo

note.snippet: , guṇākara, mahāsukha, vajira, mettābala, asama, jitāri, mahābodhi, dhammadhātu, setaketu, khaji, timutti
, dasabhūmissara, pañcañāṇa, bahukkhama, sambuddha, sabbadassī, mahābala, sabbabodha

note.original: imāni pariyāyavacanāni pāyaso amarakosato, tikaṇḍasesābhidhānato ca gahitāni
dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1313; udā. aṭṭha. 53; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 1.1.76; netti. aṭṭha. 38
kulisāsanādīni (ka.) kalimhi yuge sāsanaṃ anusāsanaṃ yassa so, athavā kalimhi pāpe vivāde vā sāsanaṃ hitasādhanaṃ yassa so (tikaṇḍasesaṭīkā 1.1.11)

alternatives.alternative: kalimhi yuge sāsanaṃ anusāsanaṃ yassa so, athavā kalimhi pāpe vivāde vā sāsanaṃ hitasādhanaṃ yassa so

note.snippet: ti vuccati, ādiccassa bandhu ñātīti nibbacanaṃ katvā. Etthapi māyādevīsuta, mahāsamaṇa, kalisāsanādīni

note.original: visanti sukatino asmiṃ iti piṭṭhapaṃ pisodarādi tidasānaṃ piṭṭhapadhiti dasasaddalopo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: visanti sukatino asmiṃ iti piṭṭhapaṃ pisodarādi tidasānaṃ piṭṭhapadhiti dasasaddalopo

note.snippet: dīsu sāmaññasmiṃyeva dvinnampi gahaṇato na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Etthāpi nāka, suraloka, tipiṭṭhapa

note.original: devo eva devatā, sakatthe tā, sakatthikā api paccayā pakatito liṅgavacanādyativattante, apīti itthittaṃ devatā eva devataṃ paññādittā aṇa (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: devo eva devatā, sakatthe tā, sakatthikā api paccayā pakatito liṅgavacanādyativattante, apīti itthittaṃ devatā eva devataṃ paññādittā aṇa

note.snippet: ñca sakatthikā pakatito liṅgavacanāni ativattantīti punnapuṃsakatta’’nti

note.original: vibhavā (ka.), rikāro devamātā siyā iti tikaṇḍe, tato bhavantīti (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: rikāro devamātā siyā iti tikaṇḍe, tato bhavantīti

note.snippet: paccayantassa niccaṃ itthiliṅgatāya itthiliṅgattameva vadeyya. Supabbā, sumanā, tidivesā, āditeyyā, divisadā, lekhā, aditinandanā, ādiccā, ribhavo

note.original: maraṇaṃ mati iti ti, matiyaṃ bhavā maccā… na maccā amaccā (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: maraṇaṃ mati iti ti, matiyaṃ bhavā maccā… na maccā amaccā

note.snippet: Hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ aṇḍaṃ hiraññaṃ, tassa gabbho bhūṇo

, nārāyano, vekuṇṭho, dāmodaro, mādhavo, sambhū, deccāri, puṇḍarīkakkho, govindo, garuḷaddhajo, pītambaro, accuto, maṅgalo, siṅgī, janāddano, upendo, indāvarajo, catubhujo, padmanābho, madhuripu, tivikkamo, devakīnandano, sorī, sirīpati, purisottamo, vanamālī, balidhaṃsī, kaṃsārāti, adhokkhajo, sabbambharo, keṭabhaji

note.original: mantī pavanabyāmi uddhavo (titaṇḍasesa 1.1.35) pavanabyādhi… uddhavo iti dve piṇhussa mantino (kaṭṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: pavanabyādhi… uddhavo iti dve piṇhussa mantino

note.snippet: Pasu migādo chagale, pamathepi pasu pume’’ti ruddo

ti kriyāpadaṃ. Sambhu, īso, sabbo, īsāno, saṅkaro, candasekharo, bhūteso, khaṇḍaparasu, girīso, maccuñjayo, pinākī, pamathādhipo, uggo, kapaddi, sirīkaṇṭho, kāḷakaṇṭho, kapālabharo, vāmadevo, mahādevo, virūpakkho, tilocano, sabbaññū, nīlalohito, māraharo, bhaggo, tyambako, tipurantako, gaṅgādharo, andhakaripu, byomakeso, bhavo, bhīmo, ruddo, umāpati, bhagālī, kapisañjano, hīro, pañcānano, khakuntalo, gopālako, piṅgakkho
, kūṭakaro, candāpīḷo, mahānaṭo, samīro, ho, nandivaḍḍhano, guḷākeso
, divapati, surapati, balārāti, sacīpati, jambhabhedī, harihayo, namucisūdano, saṃkandano, meghavāhano, ākhaṇḍalo

note.original: irāvati samudde jāto (erāvato), sese aṇa… pisodarādittā ṇatte erāvaṇo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)
amataṃ yaññasese ca, pīyūse salile ghate ayācite ca mokkhe ca, nā dhanvantaridevasu amatā māgadhīpathyā guḷucyāmalakīsu ca (medinīkosa 16 77-8)

alternatives.alternative: amataṃ yaññasese ca, pīyūse salile ghate ayācite ca mokkhe ca, nā dhanvantaridevasu amatā māgadhīpathyā guḷucyāmalakīsu ca

note.snippet: , dhanvantaridevādīsu pulliṅge, gaḷojhābhayāmalakyādīsu itthiliṅgeti tīsu vattati

note.original: tīsu phuliṅgo’ggikaṇo (amara 1.60) phuliṅgānīti aggikaṇāni (ma. ni. ṭī. 3.65)
pāṇo’pāno samānocodānabyānā ca vāyavo sarīraṭṭhā ime (amara 1.67)

alternatives.alternative: pāṇo’pāno samānocodānabyānā ca vāyavo sarīraṭṭhā ime

note.original: hadaye pāṇo gude’pāno, samāno nābhisaṇṭhito; udāno kaṇṭhadesaṭṭho, byāno sabbasarīrago iti ṭhānaniṇṇayo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: hadaye pāṇo gude’pāno, samāno nābhisaṇṭhito; udāno kaṇṭhadesaṭṭho, byāno sabbasarīrago iti ṭhānaniṇṇayo

note.snippet: . Apāno muttakarīsasukkavisaṭṭhikaro. Samāno majjhe annapacanādikaro. Udāno bhāsitagītādikaro. Byāno sedarattasavanummesanimesagatyādikaro

note.original: taṃbyāpārā ca yathā – annappavesanaṃ muttā-dyussaggo’nnavipācanaṃ bhāsaṇādi nimesādi, taṃbyāpārā kamā ime (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: taṃbyāpārā ca yathā – annappavesanaṃ muttā-dyussaggo’nnavipācanaṃ bhāsaṇādi nimesādi, taṃbyāpārā kamā ime

note.snippet: dayo tu dhammavacanā, tathā ca sīghaṃ pacati

note.original: sabbatra napuṃsakebhāve to, ādinā svanitadhanitādayo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā), ādinā dhanitaharādarāsādayo (byākhyāsudhāṭīkā)
vegato jaladhārānaṃ sambhūya patanaṃ dhārāsampāto, sara gatiyaṃ ghau iti āsāro (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: vegato jaladhārānaṃ sambhūya patanaṃ dhārāsampāto, sara gatiyaṃ ghau iti āsāro

note.original: asamabhāge pumāni, same aṃse napuṃsakattaṃ rūpabhedato, upacārato tabbhāgavati vāccaliṅgo – addhā sāṭī, addhaṃ vatthaṃ addho kambalo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: addhaṃ vuttaṃ same bhāge’’ti. Khaṇḍādidvayaṃ pana asamepi vattamānaṃ punnapuṃsake vattati, tasmā ‘‘addhaṃ vuttaṃ same bhāge’’ti ettha ‘‘aḍḍhaṃ, upaḍḍha’’nti idaṃ dvayampi saṅgahitaṃ
asamabhāge pumāni, same aṃse napuṃsakattaṃ rūpabhedato, upacārato tabbhāgavati vāccaliṅgo – addhā sāṭī, addhaṃ vatthaṃ addho kambalo

note.snippet: dayo tayo asame bhāge pume, same tu napuṃsaketi rūpabhedenāha addhaṃ vuttaṃ same bhāge’’ti. Khaṇḍādidvayaṃ pana asamepi vattamānaṃ punnapuṃsake vattati, tasmā addhaṃ vuttaṃ same bhāge’’ti ettha aḍḍhaṃ, upaḍḍha’’nti idaṃ dvayampi saṅgahitaṃ

note.original: khalitapāṭho (?), savarasāmī tu aṅguli kākalisāri sarāri tumbiari susi dīmityattayo thīpumesu iccāha (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: savarasāmī tu aṅguli kākalisāri sarāri tumbiari susi dīmityattayo thīpumesu iccāha

note.original: daṇḍakappakaraṇe āgatadhātūti attho, niruttisāramañjusāṭīkāyaṃ 253.413 piṭṭhesu passitabbaṃ
daṇḍakappakaraṇe āgatadhātūti attho, niruttisāramañjusāṭīkāyaṃ 253.413 piṭṭhesu passitabbaṃ
māpasaṃ gaganaṃ pamāṇayaṃ ukhati gacchatīti pisodarādi (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: māpasaṃ gaganaṃ pamāṇayaṃ ukhati gacchatīti pisodarādi

note.snippet: kkamena sukkapakkho pubbasaññito, kaṇhapakkho aparasaññito. Tato eva māsavisese loke sakaparapakkhoti

Tatra brahmuno dinaṃ narānaṃ udayakappo, ratti pana khayakappo. Ekasmiñca brahmadine manusaññitā catuddasa brahmasutā bhavanti. Tatrekassa manvantarassa ekasattatidibbayugāni pamāṇaṃ, tañca mānusaṃ catuddasabhi uttaraṃ
yugasatadvayaṃ. Tadevaṃ catuddasabhi manvantarehi catunavutyuttarāni navadibbayugasatāni bhavanti. Mānusaṃ tu catuvīsatiyugasahassacatukkaṃ. Esañca
yathā rājarājā’’ti. Tividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ upādānakāraṇaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ kāraṇakāraṇanti. Yathā bījaṃ aṅkurassa upādānakāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, bhūmijalādi sahakārīkāraṇaṃ, kammassa
kāraṇaṃ jaro, tassa kāraṇaṃ kapho’’ti kapho kāraṇakāraṇaṃ kammassa

note.original: vitthāro bharatamunikate nāṭyasatthe catuttha ajjhāye passitabbo
dī. ni. ṭī. 1.256; ma. ni. ṭī. 1.22; a. ni. ṭī. 2.3.59; sārattha. ṭī. 1.tatiyasaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā

note.snippet: ti, idañca mūlakriyākappaganthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi mahāvisayo satasahassaparimāṇo nayacaritādipakaraṇaṃ

note.original: dasa dāṭhimāni ṭhaḷapūpā kuṇḍa’ majājinaṃ palālapiṇḍā (nyāyabhāssa 5.2.10 moggallānapañcikāṭīkā 1.1)

alternatives.alternative: dasa dāṭhimāni ṭhaḷapūpā kuṇḍa’ majājinaṃ palālapiṇḍā

note.snippet: lesaṃ aratīti gandharo, rassassa dīghatte gandhāro cetyaññe

note.original: santo (ka.) ete ca samadā pañcamaṃ gāyanti (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 7.1)

note.snippet: hi sukhavedanādayo sampayogavasena pañcasu indriyesu uppajjanti, javanādīsu eva pana uppajjantīti tathā vuttaṃ, manindriye tūpacārā
saddā cettha ajjhāhāravācakāpi bhavanti, ajjhāhāraṃ nāma ūnapūraṇatthamadhikappabhedāharaṇaṃ

note.original: ṭhito pakkho siddhanto, pubbapakkhaṃ nirasya siddhapakkhaṭṭhāpane iti bhāvo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā)

alternatives.alternative: ṭhito pakkho siddhanto, pubbapakkhaṃ nirasya siddhapakkhaṭṭhāpane iti bhāvo

note.snippet: nīcapakatidosasambhūtarūpissariyādinimittike made, yasmiṃ sati uttaradānasādarolokanādivimukho puriso jāyate. Madopyatra katthūrīgabbaretesu, madohassebhadānesū’’ti
